structure.unit: Executive And Administrative Officers Of The Commonwealth

law.catch_line: Accounts; Overdue Bonds, Notes And Securities; Transmission To Attorney General
law.text: [ Text of section effective until January 1, 2013. For text effective January 1, 2013, see below.] He shall annually, on the first Monday of May, transmit to the attorney general an account of bonds, notes and securities in the treasury in which the commonwealth is interested and on which the principal or interest remains due and unpaid or of which the conditions have not been performed, classifying them under distinct heads. Chapter 10: Accounts; overdue bonds, notes and securities; transmission to attorney general and committees on ways and means [ Text of section as amended by 2012, 165, Sec. 92 effective January 1, 2013. See 2012, 165, Sec. 137. For text effective until January 1, 2013, see above.] He shall annually, on the first Monday of May, transmit to the attorney general and the house and senate committees on ways and means an account of bonds, notes and securities in the treasury in which the commonwealth is interested and on which the principal or interest remains due and unpaid or of which the conditions have not been performed, classifying them under distinct heads.
